name: Rogue One
description: In a time of conflict, a group of unlikely heroes band together on a mission to steal the plans to the Death Star, the Empire's ultimate weapon of destruction.
keywords: star wars,death star,space opera,darth vader character,jyn erso character

review.author: jamesgarner-62991
review.heading: The best of the new Star Wars films by some margin
review.reviewBody: This is almost perfect Star Wars. By far the best Star Wars of the new era (including the prequels). Hard to find any fault with it. If only Abrams, Johnson and other took more note of this it might have saved us from some of the faults in those other movies.
